name: Carrot
text: Activate: Main Once Per Turn If you have a character with the (Minks) type in play, rest up to one of your opponents cost 5 or less characters.

effect.text: If you have a character with the (Minks) type in play, rest up to one of your opponents cost 5 or less characters.
conditions: have a character with the (Minks) type in play
